author: Jenn Burleson Mackay
comment: I use to love this watch face.  It doesn't appear to work properly on Wear 2.0. I can't customize which background I get.

reply.author: SmartWatchStudio
reply.content: Jenn, thanks for reporting and sorry for the delay in replying. Please try new version, the problem fixed.

author: Nikki Bunch
comment: I love this watch face but it crashes over and over at least once a day at random times.
title: Love the watch face but hate the crashing
